mapper.select: select QLT_STD_CLA_ID AS qltStdClaId, QLT_STD_CLA_NAME AS qltStdClaName from PD_QLT_STD_CLA
select QLT_STD_SUB_ID AS qltStdSubId, QLT_STD_SUB_NAME AS qltStdSubName from PD_QLT_STD_SUB_CLA where QLT_STD_CLA_ID=#{filterMap.qltStdClaId}
